propList.Name: alt
propList.Description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image

propList.Name: gap
propList.Description: Letter type unit distance between left and right sides

propList.Name: icon
propList.Description: Custom icon type for an icon avatar

propList.Name: size
propList.Type: number | large | small | default | { xs: number, sm: number, ...}

propList.Name: src
propList.Description: The address of the image for an image avatar or image element

propList.Name: srcSet
propList.Description: A list of sources to use for different screen resolutions

propList.Name: draggable
propList.Description: Whether the picture is allowed to be dragged

propList.Name: onError
propList.Description: Handler when img load error, return false to prevent default fallback behavior
